description: Governance classification for runtime_math modules. Classifies each module as production_core (required for runtime decisions), production_monitor (useful diagnostics, can be disabled), or research (alien artifact, behind feature gate).

production_core.description: Required for runtime decision pipeline (decide/observe/fuse/evidence). Must be compiled into default binary.
production_core.latency_budget: Modules on hot path must meet strict <20ns / hardened <200ns

production_monitor.description: Runtime monitoring and diagnostics. Useful but not strictly required. Can be disabled for minimal builds.

research.description: Experimental/alien artifact modules. Advanced mathematical theory with unproven production value. Behind optional feature gate.
